mapper.select: select t_spot.spot_id AS spotId, spot_name AS spotName, spot_address AS spotAddress, spot_imageURL AS spotImageurl, spot_type AS spotTpye, favorite_id AS favoriteId from t_spot, t_favorite, t_user where t_spot.spot_id = t_favorite.spot_id and t_user.user_id = t_favorite.user_id and t_favorite.user_id = ${id}
select * from t_spot where spot_name like "%${kw}%"
